definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
in all parts of (a country)/various regions
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: Spitting in the street is considered to be very bad mannered.
sentences.chinese: 拂逆地吐痰，在街上吐痰是很紧张的坏习气。

sentences.english: She tries to back track, but the President simply walks away.
sentences.chinese: 她试图重新回到话题，但总统一言不发地走开了。

sentences.english: They spend long hours staring at the screen with few breaks.
sentences.chinese: 他们长时间地注视屏幕，几乎不休息。

sentences.english: I can happily say I've been off drugs for nearly a year now.
sentences.chinese: 我可以兴奋地说我此刻快一年没有沾过福寿膏了。

sentences.english: She gives me a big smile every time she sees me.
sentences.chinese: 她每次看见我都冲我热情地笑笑。

sentences.english: I am sailing against waves and squalls on the rough icy sea.
sentences.chinese: 迎着风浪，冒着沉没的危险，我在冰海中艰难地航行。

sentences.english: Mulan asked, her eyes bigger than ever.
sentences.chinese: 穆兰眼睁得大大地问道。

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您预期的收件人将能够轻松地解读它。

sentences.english: Sinatra always made it all about him, and this is maybe his best-ever performance.
sentences.chinese: 辛纳屈一贯地全力以赴，而这次是他史上最棒的演出。

sentences.english: So, typically, we use cross product to find plane equations.
sentences.chinese: 特别地，可以用外积来求平面方程。

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世纪，芭蕾渐渐地发展成为了一种舞台表演。

sentences.english: The papal captain have vainly endeavoured to induce his wife to remain behind him .
sentences.chinese: 教廷的队长曾白费力气地试图说服妻子留下不去。

sentences.english: The small chin deformity was a common developmental deformity of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: “地包天”牙是颌骨发育畸形或不良习惯所引起。

sentences.english: During Hellenistic times, Greek women also started to artificially wave and curl their hair.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊化时代期间，希腊女人就已开始人为地卷发了。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
